thread.title: adidas Originals Warms Up for Spring With Crisp White NMD CS2
thread.title_full: adidas Originals Warms Up for Spring With Crisp White NMD CS2

author: Graeme Campbell
title: adidas Originals Warms Up for Spring With Crisp White NMD CS2
text:
Visit the original post to see all 2 images from this gallery. 
Brand: adidas Originals
Model: CS2
Key Features: Similar to its predecessor, the latest CS2 features embossed strikes at the midsole lateral rear and a huge EVA plug on the medial side. Along with the usual Boost and Primeknit technology, a wrapped collar and branded heel tab is incorporated for ease of access, making it the perfect sneaker for travel or play.
Release Date: There’s no exact drop date yet, but they’ll be released at some point this spring.
Price: Again, nothing’s been confirmed, but expect to pay around $120.
Availability: You’ll be able to cop via adidas Originals .
Editor’s Notes: adidas Originals warms up for spring with a crisp white, slightly less-futuristic version of the previously teased CS2 . The subtle use of black on the collar and outsole sets off the sneaker perfectly.
If you’re in the market for something more suited to inclement weather, be sure to check out this size? exclusive GTX Gazelle .
